net.casper.data.model.filters

Class EqualsFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.data.model.filters.CDataFilter
      • net.casper.data.model.filters.EqualsFilter

  • public class EqualsFilter
extends CDataFilter
    This is the most basic type of filter. Performs an equality-based match on a given list of values. If any of the values in the list "matchValues" matches the value of the column provided, then "true" will be returned.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 111 $
    Author:
    Jonathan Liang
